member.summary: This is the saved data of the biome type map, it's a base 64 string of the byte array representing the texture.

member.summary: Which terrain component is this biomes component linked to?

member.summary: Where will the generated biome objects be stored?

member.name: M:ProceduralBiomesTool.Components.TerrainBiomesComponent.Reset
member.summary: Erase all data stored in the biome maps and destroy all gameobject in the biomes.

member.name: M:ProceduralBiomesTool.Components.TerrainBiomesComponent.AttemptToAddEcotope(ProceduralBiomesTool.Resources.EcotopeResource)
member.summary: Add an ecotope to the biomes and assign it a value it will be painted at.

member.name: M:ProceduralBiomesTool.Components.TerrainBiomesComponent.RemoveEcotope(ProceduralBiomesTool.Components.IndexedEcotope)
member.summary: Completely remove an ecotope from the biomes and allow it to be replaced.

member.name: M:ProceduralBiomesTool.Components.TerrainBiomesComponent.ClearEcotope(ProceduralBiomesTool.Resources.EcotopeResource)
member.summary: Clear an ecotope out of the biomes but leave its index intact so we can replace it.

member.name: M:ProceduralBiomesTool.Components.TerrainBiomesComponent.ReplaceEcotope(ProceduralBiomesTool.Components.IndexedEcotope,ProceduralBiomesTool.Resources.EcotopeResource)
member.summary: Replace an existing ecotope with another so that it generates in its place.

member.name: T:ProceduralBiomesTool.Generation.EcotopeLayerAssetGeneratorState
member.summary: The state of generation for a single asset within an ecotope layer. This is passed into the layer rules to be transformed.

member.summary: Which biome component was this created from?

member.summary: In the biome map texture, what byte value in the texture corresponds to this state?

member.name: T:ProceduralBiomesTool.Generation.EcotopeGeneratorTile
member.summary: A section of the biome used to split the generation into more manageable chunks.

member.name: T:ProceduralBiomesTool.Generation.EcotopeGeneratorTileLayer
member.summary: A layer of a generated tile which contains the point cloud for a single ecotope resource.

member.name: T:ProceduralBiomesTool.Resources.EcotopeResource
member.summary: Defines a group of assets and how they should be generated by the biome tool.

member.name: M:ProceduralBiomesTool.Resources.EcotopeResource.AddNew
member.summary: Create a new layer in this ecotope.

member.name: M:ProceduralBiomesTool.Resources.EcotopeResource.Swap(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Move a layer further up or down in the layers list.

member.name: M:ProceduralBiomesTool.Resources.EcotopeResource.RemoveAt(System.Int32)
member.summary: Remove a particular layer at the specified index.

member.name: T:ProceduralBiomesTool.Resources.EcotopeLayer
member.summary: An individual collection of assets in an ecotope and the rules used to define how they are generated.

member.summary: A reference to an ecotope asset for use in a layer, allows setting some

member.name: T:ProceduralBiomesTool.Resources.EcotopeGlobalRules
member.summary: A generic serializable collection of rules used by an Ecotope Resource.
